tuv.seg: Part-time workers over 16 years of age and earning over €38 in each PRSI contribution week are liable to contribute to social insurance
Tá dliteanas ar fhostaithe páirtaimseartha os cionn 16 bliana d'aois a shaothraíonn os cionn €38 i gach seachtain ÁSPC ranníocaíochtaí árachais shóisialaigh a dhéanamh
It is called Pay Related Social Insurance (PRSI) because the amount of social insurance you pay depends on your earnings and the type of work you do
Cinneann nádúr na fostaíochta agus an méid comhlán a thuilleann an fostaí an méid árachais shóisialaigh atá le híoc, mar sin, Árachas Sóisialach Pá-Choibhneasa a thugtar air
If you are a part-time worker you may not be making the maximum amount of PRSI contributions each year
Mar fhostaí páirtaimseartha, tá seans ann nach bhfuil an t-uasmhéid ranníocaíochtaí ÁSPC á déanamh agat gach bliain
The tax year and the PRSI contribution week start 1 January every year
Tosaíonn an bhliain chánach ar 1 Eanáir gach bliain agus mar sin tosaíonn an tseachtain ranníocaíochta (ÁSPC) ar an lá céanna, 1 Eanáir
As a result, the PRSI contribution week can differ from the working week
Mar sin, féadann an tseachtain oibre ÁSPC a bheith éagsúil ón seachtain ranníocaíochta
If you are in part-time work you need to be fully aware of the possible effect this can have on your social insurance entitlements

Má tá tú i bhfostaíocht pháirtaimseartha, tá sé tábhachtach go dtabharfá suntas de seo mar d'fhéadfadh sé tionchar a imirt ar do theidlíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh laistigh den chóras árachais shóisialaigh

In general, you pay a PRSI contribution in respect of each PRSI contribution week in which you work. You must be working on at least 1 day in each PRSI contribution week in order to pay a contribution
Ar an Déardaoin a thiteann 1 Eanáir 2015, mar sin ritheann gach seachtain ranníocaíochta don bhliain sin ón an Máirt go dtí an Luan
If your work pattern is week-on, week-off, Monday to Friday, you miss paying PRSI in every second PRSI contribution week, as you are not working at all during each of those weeks
Má oibríonn tú cuid de gach seachtain idir an Luan agus an Satharn mar chuid den socrú oibre páirtaimseartha, déanfaidh tú na 52 ranníocaíocht ÁSPC iomlána do 2015
In this situation, you would pay only 26 contributions in the year. Similarly, if your pattern is Monday to Friday for 3 weeks, with 1 week off, you would pay 39 contributions in the year
Áfach, má oibríonn tú seachtain scoilte (le seachtain ag obair agus seachtain shaor) a thosaíonn ar an Déardaoin, ní bhronnfar ach ranníocaíochtaí 26 seachtaine ort i 2014

However, if you work Wednesday to Friday in one week, followed by Monday and Tuesday the next, you will pay the full 52 contributions in the year, as you will have worked during each Monday-Sunday PRSI contribution week
Má thosaíonn do sheachtain scoilte ar aon lá eile, gheobhaidh tú 52 seachtain ranníocaíochtaí
In 2017, 1 January fell on a Sunday. This means that each PRSI contribution week runs from Sunday to Saturday
Ar an Céadaoin a thiteann 1 Eanáir 2014, mar sin ritheann gach seachtain ranníocaíochta don bhliain sin ón an Máirt go dtí an Luan

However if you work a split week which starts on a Thursday you will only get 26 weeks of contributions in 2015. If your split week starts on any other day you will get the full 52 weeks of contributions
Má oibríonn tú cuid de gach seachtain idir an Luan agus an Satharn mar chuid den socrú oibre páirtaimseartha, déanfaidh tú na 52 ranníocaíocht ÁSPC iomlána do 2014

If your part-time work arrangement required that you work part of every week between the days Monday to Saturday, you will have received your full 52 PRSI contributions for 2014. However if you worked a split week which starts on a Wednesday you will only get 26 weeks of contributions in 2014
Áfach, má oibríonn tú seachtain scoilte (le seachtain ag obair agus seachtain shaor) a thosaíonn ar an Céadaoin, ní bhronnfar ach ranníocaíochtaí 26 seachtaine ort i 2014
If your split week starts on any other day you will get the full 52 weeks of contributions
Má thosaíonn do sheachtain scoilte ar aon lá eile, gheobhaidh tú 52 seachtain ranníocaíochtaí
In 2013, 1 January fell on a Tuesday which meant that each PRSI contribution week ran from Tuesday to Monday
Ar an Máirt a thiteann 1 Eanáir 2013, mar sin ritheann gach seachtain ranníocaíochta don bhliain sin ón an Máirt go dtí an Luan
In 2012, 1 January fell on a Sunday which meant that each PRSI contribution week ran from Sunday to Saturday
Ar an Domnach a thiteann 1 Eanáir 2012, mar sin ritheann gach seachtain ranníocaíochta don bhliain sin ón Domnach go dtí an Satharn
In 2011, 1 January fell on a Saturday which meant that each PRSI contribution week ran from Saturday to Friday
Ar an Satharn a thiteann 1 Eanáir 2011, mar sin ritheann gach seachtain ranníocaíochta don bhliain sin ón Aoine go dtí an Déardaoin
In 2010, 1 January fell on a Friday which meant that that each PRSI contribution week ran from Friday to Thursday
Ar an Aoine a thiteann 1 Eanáir 2010, mar sin ritheann gach seachtain ranníocaíochta don bhliain sin ón Aoine go dtí an Déardaoin
Nuair a thiteann an 1 Eanáir ar an Luan, ní mór a bheith ar an airdeall má tá tú fostaithe go páirtaimseartha agus má tá seachtain iomlán saor agat mar chuid den phátrún oibre
Toisc nach mbeidh tú ag obair ar feadh seachtaine ní bheidh an deis agat ranníocaíocht ÁSPC a dhéanamh don seachtain sin
Má tá pátrún oibre ag duine ina bhfuil seachtain oibre agus ansin seachtain saor aige/aici, ní dhéanfaidh sé/sí ach 26 ranníocaíocht don bhliain
│Working a fixed split week that │26 │ │starts on Thursday │ │
To determine the rate of PRSI payable by you and your employer your gross pay is divided by the number of contribution weeks that is covered by your pattern of work
Nuair atáthar ag ríomh an ráta ÁSPC go gcaithfidh tú agus d'fhostóir a íoc déantar do thuillimh iomlán a roinnt faoi líon na seachtainí ranníocaíochta nuair a bhí tú ag obair
More information can be found in our document about your liability to pay PRSI
Faigh tuilleadh eolais anseo mar gheall ar do dhliteanas le hÁSPC a íoc
If you earn between €38 and €352 you do not have to pay PRSI
Má thuilleann tú idir €38 agus €352 ní gá duit ÁSPC a íoc
Ach sa chás seo, is é an fostóir a íocann an tÁSPC
More information can be found in our document about your employer's duty to pay social insurance
Faigh tuilleadh eolais anseo faoin dualgas atá ar an bhfostóir árachas sóisialach a íoc
